tag_list: harvard, social-merchandising, social-shopping, founder, ceo, bevy, madrona, trilogy, indoor-mapping, indoor-navigation, indoor-positioning, mapping, mobile-marketing
overview:
Kevin Foreman is the Vice President of Mobile Applications at Inrix of Kirkland, WA.

Previously, he was the CEO of Point inside. Prior to that, he was the founder & CEO of Bevy, Inc. a social shopping start-up. Earlier, he was the General Manager of the Mobile Business Unit at RealNetworks Inc. Finally, he was Real’s GM, Helix, and was credited with launching Real’s open source strategy.
